text: PATIENT: Um, hum.

DOCTOR: But because the beam of radiation is so precise, it’s called a knife because it’s as precise as a surgeon’s knife. Um if you think that I’m misunderstanding and you really are more open to the hormone therapy option as well or instead of radiation and we also have a trial in that category which is trying to ask the question about whether all hormone therapy in conjunction with a new hormone therapy is better than just the old hormone therapy by itself, the conventional.
PATIENT: Uh hum.
DOCTOR: So I don’t really know where you’re at but I think I’m hearing that you may be interested in thinking about this radiation option first?
PATIENT: Well as a Patient, you have a person that quote/unquote “has the cancer”.
DOCTOR: Uh hum.
PATIENT: My primary objective would be to get rid of it.
DOCTOR: Uh hum.

PATIENT: So if that’s not possible through the methods that you have, then what I need to look at uh is what can you offer us as far as a method of treatment um to kind of you know work on this targeted area –
DOCTOR: Um hum.
PATIENT: - you know still thinking that I mean you know it’s not to say this is the only place it’s going to develop.
DOCTOR: Right.
PATIENT: I mean you could target this -
DOCTOR: Right.

DOCTOR: Yeah.
FAMILY MEMBER: His PSA being low, and the prostate not being enlarged, and the preliminary report they told us we thought when you called down that day we were here.
DOCTOR: I know. I’m really upset by passing incorrect information to you based on the verbal report. That’s the danger of doing that.

PATIENT: We’re hoping you got the samples switched or something like that.

Doctor-Patient-Conversation-Analysis-pos.text: Thank you for your valuable contributions to our study! Our goal is to understand how doctors can communicate better with patients by looking at different perceptions of the doctors’ qualities. As we analyze different perceptions of doctors' qualities, understanding your personal experiences with the medical system helps contextualize these ratings. We invite you to share insights by answering the following questions. Your answers to these questions are strictly confidential.
